body:
Hey guys, its kind of late and I'm bored, listening to Slim Shady, so i decided to ask you guys:

What are your top 10 favourite Eminem songs in actual order?

If you are having serious trouble deciding, you can do an equal position of two songs.

But also, no matter how strong you opinion, please don't guilt others and judge their choice, thanks!

Ill start:

1. Rock Bottom
2. Beautiful
3. The Real Slim Shady
=4. Just Don't Give A F***
=4. The Way I Am
=4. Sing For The Moment
5. Stan
6. Mockingbird 
=7. Kim
=7. 97' Bonnie And Clyde 
=8. Rap God
=8. Role Model
=9. If I Had
=9. When I'm Gone
=10. Difficult
=10. Headlights
=10. Brain Damage

Your Go! (Sorry about my damn long list)
